problem_validation.willingness_to_pay: 25,000 to $65,000 for custom market research projects
problem_validation.market_size_estimate: Significant, affecting a large number of startups

evidence.key_insight: 34% of startup failures are attributed to a poor product-market fit.
Common pitfalls during market validation include overenthusiasm leading to errors.
Big companies spend nearly 5-10% of their annual revenue on market research.
Market research is essential to ensure the viability of a business idea.
35% of startups fail because the product has no market.

alternative_solutions.name: [Mentionlytics]
alternative_solutions.approach: Monitoring online mentions and gaining insights into market trends.
limitations: May not provide comprehensive market analysis reports.

alternative_solutions.name: [Semrush]
alternative_solutions.approach: Offers a broad understanding of market trends and competitor analysis.

alternative_solutions.name: [BuzzSumo]
alternative_solutions.approach: Helps monitor online mentions and track content performance.
limitations: May require additional tools for in-depth market analysis.

problem_statement_feedback:

- Specificity: The content is not specific to a single problem statement.
- Improvements: Define a clear problem statement related to the cost of market analysis tools for entrepreneurs.
research_limitations: None encountered during the research process.
